author: Tyler Clifford
title: Jim Cramer responds to viral 'Mad Money' picture: 'There's a seething anger sweeping this country' aimed at Wall Street
description: "I agree it's messed up, but the contrast between a roaring stock market and an obliterated job market does tell you a lot about what's happening at this moment," he said.
content:
CNBC's Jim Cramer on Tuesday explained the paradox of a stock market that is heating up while the state of the economy appears to be crumbling amid a health crisis and economic shutdown in the United States.
"At the end of the day, the stock market's made up… [+4105 chars]
